definitions.definition: Excessive activity , worry , bother , or talk about something.
examples: They made a big fuss about the wedding plans.

definitions.definition: A complaint or noise ; a scene .
examples: If you make enough of a fuss about the problem, maybe they'll fix it for you.

definitions.definition: An exhibition of affection or admiration .
examples: They made a great fuss over the new baby.

main_definition: ( countable or uncountable ) Excessive activity , worry , bother , or talk about something.
secondary_definitions: A complaint or noise ; a scene .
An exhibition of affection or admiration .
